src_original: yena jñānena sarvatathāgatasiddhir api prāpsyase /  kim anyā siddhiḥ /
na ca tvayādṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya purato vaktavyam /  mā te samayo vyathed iti /
tataḥ svayaṃ vajrācāryaḥ krodhaterintirīm evaṃ ūrdhvamukhīṃ baddhvā vajraṃ śiṣyasya mūrdhni sthāpyaivaṃ vadet /
ayaṃ te samayavajro mūrdhniṃ te sphārayed yadi tvaṃ kasyacid brūyāḥ /
tatas tayaiva samayamudrayodakaṃ śayathā hṛdayena satkṛtya parijapya tasmai vajraśiṣyāya pāyayed iti /
trividhāṃ śīlaśikṣāṃ ca kuśaladharmasaṃgraham //  sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmy ahaṃ dṛḍham //
vajraghaṇṭāṃ ca mudrāṃ ca pratigṛhṇāmi tattvataḥ //  ācāryaṃ ca grahīṣyāmi mahāvajrakuloccaye //
caturdānaṃ pradāsyāmi ṣaṭkṛtvā tu dine dine //
